Posts.EditableText: You may have noticed we now have an "Editor's Picks" section at the top of the front page on http://textadventures.co.uk - the idea is to highlight some good games that haven't made it to the top of the rankings for whatever reason. Let me know if you find any hidden gems among the archives that you think are worthy of a pick!
